message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV 

The paper addresses the problem of learning a task from demonstration using inverse reinforcement learning, which is a subfield of machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The proposed algorithm is applicable to several different tasks, including robotics (cs.RO) and computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also discusses the integration of different forms of human feedback, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY).
